description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记、国务委员、国务院秘书长等职。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, State Councilor, and Secretary-General of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省的省会，罗干的出生地。
description.en: The capital city of Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Luo Gan.

en: University of Science and Technology Beijing

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名高等学府，罗干曾于1953年至1954年在此学习。
description.en: A prominent institution of higher learning in Beijing, China, where Luo Gan studied from 1953 to 1954.

zh-cn: 莱比锡卡尔·马克思大学

description.zh-cn: 位于德国萨克森州莱比锡市的一所大学，罗干曾于1954年至1955年在此学习德语。
description.en: A university in Leipzig, Saxony, Germany, where Luo Gan studied German from 1954 to 1955.

en: Freiberg University of Mining and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于德国弗莱贝格的工业大学，罗干曾于1956年至1962年在此学习机械铸造专业。
description.en: An industrial university in Freiberg, Germany, where Luo Gan studied mechanical casting from 1956 to 1962.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动，期间罗干受到冲击被下放劳动。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China, during which Luo Gan was impacted and sent down for labor.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物，曾任第一机械工业部部长、中共河南省委第一书记。他是罗干的领导和提拔者。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China, who served as Minister of the First Ministry of Machine Building and First Secretary of the Henan Provincial Committee of the CPC. He was Luo Gan's superior and promoter.

nodes.id: 河南省科学技术委员会

zh-cn: 河南省科学技术委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省政府负责科技工作的部门，罗干曾任主任。
description.en: The department responsible for science and technology work in the Henan Provincial Government, where Luo Gan once served as director.

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省的省级行政机关，罗干曾任副省长。
description.en: The provincial administrative organ of Henan Province, China, where Luo Gan served as vice governor.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的全国性工会组织，罗干曾任副主席。
description.en: The national trade union organization led by the Communist Party of China, where Luo Gan served as vice chairman.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国劳动部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国劳动部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，主管全国劳动事业，罗干曾任部长。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national labor affairs, where Luo Gan served as minister.

nodes.id: 陈俊生 (全国政协副主席)

zh-cn: 陈俊生 (全国政协副主席)

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物，曾任国务院秘书长，后由罗干接任该职务。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China who served as Secretary-General of the State Council, a position later succeeded by Luo Gan.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前领导人，曾任国务院总理。1989年曾与罗干一同陪同赵紫阳到天安门广场。
description.en: A former leader of the People's Republic of China who served as Premier of the State Council. In 1989, he accompanied Zhao Ziyang to Tiananmen Square with Luo Gan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前领导人，曾任中共中央总书记。1989年由罗干等人陪同到天安门广场。
description.en: A former leader of the People's Republic of China who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. He was accompanied by Luo Gan and others to Tiananmen Square in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国最高领导职位的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the highest leadership positions in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政法委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政法委员会
en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会领导和管理全国政法工作的职能部门，罗干曾任书记。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads and manages political and legal work nationwide. Luo Gan once served as its secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物，曾任中共中央政法委书记，后由罗干接任。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China who served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, a position later succeeded by Luo Gan.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十五届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1997年至2002年间的最高领导机关，罗干为该届中央委员、政治局委员和书记处书记。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 1997 to 2002. Luo Gan was a member of its Central Committee, Politburo, and Secretariat.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，罗干曾任委员。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China, where Luo Gan served as a member.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构，罗干曾任书记。
description.en: The working body of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and its Standing Committee, where Luo Gan served as a secretary.

description.zh-cn: 一种新兴宗教运动，罗干被指控为策划和执行对其镇压的主要负责人之一。
description.en: A new religious movement, Luo Gan is accused of being one of the main officials responsible for planning and executing its suppression.

description.zh-cn: 中国理论物理学家，据称是罗干的亲属，并被指与罗干共同策划了导致法轮功被镇压的系列事件。
description.en: A Chinese theoretical physicist, said to be a relative of Luo Gan, and accused of co-planning with Luo Gan a series of events that led to the suppression of Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 为处理法轮功问题而成立的机构，罗干曾任副组长。
description.en: An agency established to handle the Falun Gong issue, where Luo Gan served as deputy head.

nodes.id: 中央新疆工作协调小组

zh-cn: 中央新疆工作协调小组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会设立的负责新疆事务的议事协调机构，罗干曾任组长。
description.en: A deliberative and coordinating body established by the CPC Central Committee to handle Xinjiang affairs, where Luo Gan served as its head.

nodes.id: 中央西藏工作协调小组

zh-cn: 中央西藏工作协调小组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会设立的负责西藏事务的议事协调机构，罗干曾任组长。
description.en: A deliberative and coordinating body established by the CPC Central Committee to handle Tibet affairs, where Luo Gan served as its head.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2002年至2007年间的最高领导机关，罗干为该届中央委员和政治局常委。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2002 to 2007. Luo Gan was a member of its Central Committee and Politburo Standing Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构，罗干曾任委员。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China, where Luo Gan served as a member.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，接替罗干担任中共中央政治局常委和中央政法委书记。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Luo Gan as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第三代中央领导集体的核心，曾任中共中央总书记。被阿根廷法院与罗干一同认定在镇压法轮功问题上犯有危害人类罪。
description.en: The core of the third generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. He was found guilty of crimes against humanity in the suppression of Falun Gong along with Luo Gan by an Argentine court.

description.zh-cn: 阿根廷的联邦司法机构，其刑事及惩治庭曾下令逮捕江泽民和罗干。
description.en: The federal judicial body of Argentina, whose criminal court ordered the arrest of Jiang Zemin and Luo Gan.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十二届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十二届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1987年间的最高领导机关，罗干为该届候补中央委员。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 1982 to 1987. Luo Gan was an alternate member of its Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1987年至1992年间的最高领导机关，罗干为该届中央委员。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 1987 to 1992. Luo Gan was a member of its Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十四届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1992年至1997年间的最高领导机关，罗干为该届中央委员。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 1992 to 1997. Luo Gan was a member of its Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央总书记。罗干在其任期内担任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. Luo Gan served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任国务院总理。罗干在其任期内担任国务委员和国务院秘书长。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council. Luo Gan served as State Councilor and Secretary-General of the State Council during his premiership.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任国务院总理。罗干在其任期内担任国务委员。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council. Luo Gan served as State Councilor during his premiership.

description.zh-cn: 罗干之子。
description.en: Son of Luo Gan.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，罗干受到冲击，被下放到“五七”干校劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Luo Gan was politically impacted and sent down to a 'May Seventh' Cadre School for manual labor.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共河南省委第一书记的段君毅大力提拔了曾是自己老部下的罗干，罗干于1980年出任河南省科技委员会主任。
description.en: Duan Junyi, then First Secretary of the Henan Provincial Committee of the CPC, strongly promoted Luo Gan, his former subordinate, who was appointed Director of the Henan Provincial Science and Technology Commission in 1980.

relationships.target: 河南省科学技术委员会

position.zh-cn: 副主席、书记处书记、党组副书记
position.en: Vice Chairman, Secretary of the Secretariat, and Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国劳动部
陈俊生 (全国政协副主席)

description.zh-cn: 因陈俊生病重无法理事，罗干接替其国务院秘书长的职务。
description.en: Due to Chen Junsheng's serious illness and inability to perform his duties, Luo Gan succeeded him as the Secretary-General of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 罗干陪同时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳到天安门广场要求学生停止绝食活动。
description.en: Luo Gan accompanied then-General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Zhao Ziyang to Tiananmen Square to ask students to stop their hunger strike.

description.zh-cn: 罗干与时任中共中央办公厅主任温家宝陪同时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳到天安门广场要求学生停止绝食活动。
description.en: Luo Gan, along with then-Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee Wen Jiabao, accompanied then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang to Tiananmen Square to ask students to stop their hunger strike.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 罗干接替任建新出任中共中央政法委员会书记。
description.en: Luo Gan succeeded Ren Jianxin as the Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局
中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 据《屠杀》一书称，时任国务委员罗干可能为了谋求个人晋升，从1996年就开始调查和准备“镇压”法轮功。
description.en: According to the book 'The Slaughter', then-State Councilor Luo Gan may have started investigating and preparing for the 'suppression' of Falun Gong as early as 1996 to seek personal promotion.

description.zh-cn: 据称何祚庥是罗干的亲属。
description.en: He Zuoxiu is said to be a relative of Luo Gan.

relationships.target: 中央新疆工作协调小组
中央西藏工作协调小组
中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 周永康接替罗干担任中共中央政治局常委和中央政法委书记的职务。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang succeeded Luo Gan as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 阿根廷联邦法院认定罗干在镇压法轮功运动中犯下“危害人类罪”，并下令对其进行逮捕。
description.en: An Argentine federal court found Luo Gan guilty of 'crimes against humanity' for his role in the suppression of Falun Gong and issued an order for his arrest.

description.zh-cn: 阿根廷联邦法院认定江泽民在镇压法轮功运动中犯下“危害人类罪”，并下令对其进行逮捕。
description.en: An Argentine federal court found Jiang Zemin guilty of 'crimes against humanity' for his role in the suppression of Falun Gong and issued an order for his arrest.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十二届中央委员会
中国共产党第十三届中央委员会
中国共产党第十四届中央委员会
中国共产党第十五届中央委员会
中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政法委员会书记
position.en: Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任中共中央总书记期间，罗干任中央政法委书记。
description.en: During Jiang Zemin's tenure as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Luo Gan served as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常务委员会委员
position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，罗干任中央政治局常委。
description.en: During Hu Jintao's tenure as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Luo Gan served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在李鹏担任国务院总理期间，罗干任国务委员。
description.en: During Li Peng's premiership of the State Council, Luo Gan served as a State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 在朱镕基担任国务院总理期间，罗干任国务委员。
description.en: During Zhu Rongji's premiership of the State Council, Luo Gan served as a State Councilor.
